Player History
Earned first career win on 5/16/1985...
9/3/1986: Signed a contract extension with Montreal, $6,420,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 5/6/1987 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/28/1988 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/12/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
